attributes.action: Force the banks and building societies to speed up the time they take for transactions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As more and more peopel are using electronic banking for payments and receipt of money to and from their accounts, the banks still take the old several day rule for money transactions, in some cases causing frustration and other problems as well as the possibility of late payments.
Surely with money instantly being taken from an account, it can also be sent to the payee in the same day or maximum of 24 hours, not in 3 or more working days. 7 - 10  working days in the case of building societies.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
